lines.text: Every good soldier needs a crest for his cap. And you shall have your pin, set with diamonds if you wish.

And from now on, somewhere in Germany is a man with a precision rifle and the high degree of intelligence and training that is required to use it. It may be days, months or even years, but this time he clearly knows his purpose and, unflinching, faces his destiny.
I present you with this dangerous weapon, madmoiselle, with my undying gratitude and admiration. May you never lodge it in the wrong heart.
Have you committed a crime, sir?
Was it, um, about a woman?
I thought so. They're a dickens of a problem, aren't they, sir?
